inclusion.criterion: Aged 6 to 7 months (168 to 224 days) or 17 to 19 months on the day of the first visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent form has been signed and dated by the parent(s) or other guardian and by an independent witness if required by local regulations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject and parent/guardian are able to attend all scheduled visits and to comply with all trial procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of oral or injectable antibiotic therapy within 72 hours prior to the first blood draw
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic illness that, in the opinion of the investigator, is at a stage where it might interfere with trial conduct or completion
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has high blood pressure and signs of septicemia. He was diagnosed with atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
